      • getX

        public int getX()
        Getter method for Ghost's x coordinate in unit of pixels.
        Returns:
        x, x coordinate

      • getY

        public int getY()
        Getter method for Ghost's y coordinate in unit of pixels.
        Returns:
        y, y coordinate

      • getIdentity

        public java.lang.String getIdentity()
        Getter method for identity(type) of the ghost
        Returns:
        for generic ghost: null, for Ambusher: "Ambusher", for Chaser: "Chaser", for Ignorant: "Ignorant", for Whim: "Whim".

      • getSodaModePointer

        public int getSodaModePointer()
        Getter method of sodaModePointer
        Returns:
        int sodaModePointer

      • getIJPointers

        public static int[] getIJPointers()
        Getter method for modePointerI and modePointerJ. modePointerI and modePointerJ are used for tracking Ghost's time in modeLengths.
        Returns:
        int[] {modePointerI,modePointerJ}

      • setFrightenedModeLength

        public static void setFrightenedModeLength(int length)
        A static setter method which sets the frightened mode length for the entire ghost class.
        Parameters:
        length - specified in the config file.

      • generateClosest

        public int generateClosest(int targetX,
                           int targetY)
        Returns:
        Closest, a code range from 0 to 12, representing different states of Ghost's motion relative to target position.

      • moveAccordingToClosest

        public void moveAccordingToClosest(java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<Cell>> cellMap,
                                   int closest)
        Parameters:
        cellMap - list of list of Cells.
        closest - code generated by generateClosest(). This method follows after the Closest code generated by generateClosest(), Give Ghost with a given code a fixed pattern of movement.

      • setIJPointers

        public static void setIJPointers(int modePointerI,
                                 int modePointerJ)
        Setter method for I,J modePointers.
        Parameters:
        modePointerI: - small increment pointer
        modePointerJ: - mode reverse pointer

      • updateGhostFrightened

        public static void updateGhostFrightened(Waka waka)
        A static method synchronises Waka and Ghost's frightened state.

      • draw

        public void draw(processing.core.PApplet app,
                 Waka waka)
        Parameters:
        app: - game app
        waka: - Waka The method draws the Ghost's image to app. It also updates the sodaModePointer and sodaMode of the Ghost.

      • toLeft

        public boolean toLeft(java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<Cell>> cellMap)
        Elementary move, if possible, move the ghost to the Left, return true. Otherwise, return false.
        Parameters:
        cellMap: - list of list of Cells
        Returns:
        boolean

      • toUp

        public boolean toUp(java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<Cell>> cellMap)

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        boolean

        public boolean toDown(java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<Cell>> cellMap)

      • getFrightened

        public boolean getFrightened()
        Getter method for frightened
        Returns:
        boolean

      • goBack

        public int goBack()
        method designed to move ghosts when they meet a dead end/trap. Ghosts are allowed to move back.
        Returns:
        lastDirection: latest direction of the Ghost;

      • move

        public void move(java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<Cell>> cellMap,
                 int wakaX,
                 int wakaY,
                 java.lang.String direction,
                 boolean sodaMode)
        methods of move that will be implemented in child classes. This method will be implemented by Ambusher to target 4 grid spaces ahead of Waka.

      • move

        public void move(java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<Cell>> cellMap,
                 int wakaX,
                 int wakaY,
                 boolean sodaMode)
        methods of move that will be implemented in child classes. This method will be implemented by Chaser to chase Waka.

      • move

        public void move(java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<Cell>> cellMap,
                 int wakaX,
                 int wakaY,
                 java.lang.String direction,
                 int chaserX,
                 int chaserY,
                 boolean sodaMode)
        methods of move that will be implemented in child classes. This method will be implemented by Whim to chase double the vector from Chaser to 2 grid spaces ahead of Waka.

      • move

        public void move(java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<Cell>> cellMap)
        method for randomly moving Ghosts when they are in frightened mode.

      • reverseMode

        public void reverseMode()
        This method reverses the scatter state of the ghost.

      • touch

        public boolean touch(int wakaX,
                     int wakaY)
        This method checks if the Waka and Ghosts are touching
        Parameters:
        wakaX: - x coordinate of Waka in unit of Pixel.
        wakaY: - y coordinate of Waka in unit of Pixel.
        Returns:
        boolean: true/false.

        public static void ghostsDraw(App app,
                              java.util.ArrayList<Ghost> ghosts,
                              Waka waka,
                              boolean debug)
        Static method draw all the ghosts in ghosts ArrayList onto the App.
        Parameters:
        app: - game app
        ghosts: - ArrayList pf ghosts
        waka: - Waka
        debug: - whether debug mode

      • ghostEat

        public static int ghostEat(java.util.ArrayList<Ghost> ghosts,
                           Waka waka,
                           App app,
                           int lives)
        this method checks if ghosts are touching with Waka, and returns number of lives lost.
        Parameters:
        ghosts: - ArrayList of ghosts
        waka: - Waka
        app: - game app
        lives: - number of lives
        Returns:
        lostLives: number of lives lost

      • setFrightened

        public void setFrightened(boolean frightened)
        Setter method for frightened
        Parameters:
        frightened: - boolean variable;

      • checkReverse

        public static void checkReverse(java.util.ArrayList<Ghost> ghosts,
                                processing.data.JSONArray modelengths,
                                boolean enableFrightenedMode)
        This method checks if the ghosts need to change between scatter - chase modes, by checking I,J modePointers. It is also a clock that will pause when ghosts are in frightened mode.
        Parameters:
        ghosts: - ArrayList of ghosts
        modelengths: - specified by the configuration file.
        enableFrightenedMode: - boolean variable.

      • ghostsMove

        public static void ghostsMove(java.util.ArrayList<Ghost> ghosts,
                              java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<Cell>> cellMap,
                              Waka waka,
                              java.lang.String direction)
        Static method that move all the ghosts in once.
        Parameters:
        ghosts: - ArrayList of ghosts
        cellMap: - ArrayList of ArrayList of cells
        waka: - Waka
        direction: - waka's current direction

        public void setDebug(boolean debug)
        Setter method for debug
        Parameters:
        debug: - boolean variable
